summary: Notflix - A Netflix parody web app where users can upload their own fake films. The UI should closely mimic Netflix's design and branding.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Notflix logo with red lettering on transparent background, Netflix-inspired typography (notflix-logo.dim_300x100.png)
- Hero banner background image with dark cinematic gradient (hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
- Placeholder film thumbnail for empty states showing film reel icon (placeholder-thumbnail.dim_300x450.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Netflix-inspired visual design with a dark theme (black background, red accents), matching Netflix's typography and layout patterns including hero banner, horizontal scrolling film rows, and similar navigation structure
Implement film upload functionality allowing users to submit their own fake films with title, description, thumbnail image, and video file
Create a film browsing interface displaying all uploaded films organized by categories in horizontal scrolling rows, similar to Netflix's content discovery pattern
Build a video playback interface that displays the selected film with standard video controls (play, pause, seek, volume, fullscreen)
Design and implement the Notflix logo and branding that parodies Netflix's visual identity while maintaining a distinct identity
